how to weld.. At this moment there is a problem with fuel but devs should fix it soon. Should be funny to play with crowd.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nThis game is one of the best ways ro waste money, besides nether". If you have 11 Euros and don't know how to waste them in the most useless way
recommended: except for the boredom you have to overcome to play this more than 10 minutes.\nTheres literally nothing to do in this game
hoursPlayed: besides collecting parts that are all over the place and are found within 5 minutes. then you have to search for the weilding table
helpfulPercent:
install them onto the plane and yep -> you're done with this game.
In this state of devopment it's clearly a nope and looking at the concept of this game I don't expect more to come.

There's not even a day/night cycle
votesHelpful: of you haven*t eaten a long time and your food-meter is down
votesTotal: you fully recover from one banana and so on. Save your money on this game and give it to charity or the local animal shelter.\n\n"

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nSadly I have not been able to play the game at all...Just start the game and hit a Please wait across the screen...waited for a bit and nothing...validated files and still please wait screen. This game looked fun but with no way to try it out my recommendation for this game will be dont buy. At least for now...hopefully

reviewText:
Early Access Review

False Advertising, Dont be ripped off
The store page lists features that are NOT in the game, there is only 1 game mode, 'The Crash' and it is Multiplayer.
I know the game is Early Access, but noone should have to pay money for a game in this state, it's like a poor mans Don't Starve. Seems they altered the store page to cover their tracks.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Fun game, Liked the way multiplayer worked, playing aga another player and rush out to repair your plane. The best part was that u really dident want to quit playing the game until you was done repairing the plane, maybe thats just me,

If u got 1 hour of free time, i recommend try the game. was nice.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nDo not buy!  Why on earth would you want to play this?  Run around in a multiplayer that doesnt and wont work properly.  It took a while to understand that only multiplayer works.  All the intro option screens dont do anything.  Once playing you collect airplane parts in your backpack which gets too full after picking up a few items.  You hunt down the items in this bad game, dont waste your time or money!

reviewText:
Early Access Review

So far, I am going to not recommend this.
I would love to tell you about the game play, but I bought this on the 2nd of April and have yet to be able to get in.  Have reinstalled 3-4 times and nothing.  Posted on the forums and nothing about how to fix this yet and nothing from the devs yet either.
Will be sure to update this once/if it is fixed, but figure to warn others first hand.
Add on to review.  Is 28 July 2015 and still have yet to play this.  No response on forums.It is like having no kids and no interuptions for the weekend, then realizing you are out of lube.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nIf you have a free weekend or some time over this is a fair timedump, it's no masterpiece and it has it's bugs but the developers seem ok and thanked me for my feedback and even asked me for ideas and improvements and we shared contact info. I got a sneak peak of coming stuff and it seems fun and was promised to play it first hand when they got a stable version. So I would say that if you are looking for a game where you can be a part of creating a better game, this is for you.
